job_tasks.phrase: Ontwikkeling van AI-modellen: ontwerp, ontwikkel, en implementeer geavanceerde voorspellende modellen en algoritmes.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the core activities of building and implementing predictive models and algorithms, which falls under the Modeling task.

job_tasks.phrase: Je werkt aan diverse uitdagingen zoals computer vision, regressie- en classificatieproblemen, optimalisatie en natural language processing (NLP).
job_tasks.justification: This phrase lists specific types of models and problems that an AI Engineer works on, such as computer vision, regression, classification, and NLP, all central to the Modeling task.

job_tasks.phrase: Experimenten en Proof-of-Concepts: Ontwikkel experimenten om de technische haalbaarheid van verschillende modellen aan te tonen en om ze onderling te vergelijken.
job_tasks.justification: Developing experiments to demonstrate technical feasibility and compare models is a key part of the model development and evaluation process, fitting within the Modeling task.

job_tasks.phrase: implementeer geavanceerde voorspellende modellen en algoritmes.
job_tasks.justification: While 'implementeer' can sometimes overlap with MLOps, in this context, it's about putting the developed models into practice, which is often part of the broader software development effort to make them usable.

job_tasks.phrase: Cross-functionele samenwerking: werk samen met diverse afdelingen om AI-oplossingen naadloos te integreren binnen onze bedrijfsprocessen.
job_tasks.justification: Integrating AI solutions into business processes implies building or adapting systems to accommodate these solutions, which is a software development activity.

job_tasks.phrase: werk samen met diverse afdelingen om AI-oplossingen naadloos te integreren binnen onze bedrijfsprocessen.
job_tasks.justification: Collaborating with diverse departments to integrate AI solutions into business processes requires understanding those business processes and how AI can serve them.

job_tasks.phrase: Cross-functionele samenwerking: werk samen met diverse afdelingen om AI-oplossingen naadloos te integreren binnen onze bedrijfsprocessen.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions collaboration with different departments.

job_tasks.phrase: Kennisdeling en presentatie: deel je bevindingen en aanbevelingen met zowel technische teams als niet-technische stakeholders.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to sharing findings and recommendations with both technical and non-technical audiences.

job_tasks.phrase: Blijf up-to-date met de laatste trends in data science en AI, en deel deze kennis binnen het bedrijf.
job_tasks.justification: Staying up-to-date with the latest trends indicates a need for continuous learning and adaptability in the rapidly evolving AI field.

soft_skills.phrase: Cross-functionele samenwerking: werk samen met diverse afdelingen om AI-oplossingen naadloos te integreren binnen onze bedrijfsprocessen.
Kennisdeling en presentatie: deel je bevindingen en aanbevelingen met zowel technische teams als niet-technische stakeholders.
Blijf up-to-date met de laatste trends in data science en AI, en deel deze kennis binnen het bedrijf.

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the development, implementation, and experimentation with predictive models and algorithms across various domains like computer vision, regression, classification, and NLP. While there's some overlap with software development for integration, the core focus is on the modeling aspect rather than building user-facing applications or GenAI specific tasks.
